bt: Depressive symptoms, regular physical activity and quality of life (euroqol-5 dimensions and a test evaluating the copd) were also evaluated.The results of the analysis included 940 subjects.The prevalence of cognitive impairment was 39.4%.Multivariate logistic regression models revealed that cognitive impairment was associated with educational level (probability ratio [or ] = 0.096, confidence interval of 95% [ci ] = 0.0110,447) and a more mediocre quality of life measured by the social rate euroqol-5 dimensions (or = 0.967 , 95% ci = 0.9500..

src: deconstructing the mechanistic basis of neurodegenerative disorders , such as huntington 's disease ( hd ) , has been a particularly challenging undertaking , relying mostly on post - mortem tissue samples , non - neural cell lines from affected individuals , and model organisms . two articles recently published in cell stem cell report first the generation and characterization of induced pluripotent stem cell ( ipsc)-derived models for hd , and second , the genetic correction of a disease - causing cag expansion mutation in ipscs from individuals with hd . taken together , these two studies provide a framework for the production and validation of ipsc materials for human neurodegenerative disease research and yield crucial tools for investigating future therapies .
bt: Deconstructing the mechanical basis of neurodegenerative disorders, such as Huntington's disease (HDD), has been a particularly challenging undertaking, based primarily on post-mortem tissue samples, non-neural cell lines from affected individuals and model organisms.Two articles recently published in Cell Stem Cell relate first to the generation and characterization of induced pluripotent stem cell (ipsc) derived models for Huntington's syndrome (HDD), and secondly, the genetic correction of a disease caused by a cage expansion mutation in the IPSCs of individuals with HDD, which offers new perspectives for treatment of this condition.

src: experienced registered dietitians collected one - day dietary intake using the 24-hour recall method . the mean scores for dqi - i , ahei , and hdi were 68.9 8.2 , 39.4 8.9 , and 5.0 1.3 , respectively . after adjustment for age , body mass index , and energy intake , dqi - i and hdi were found to have a significant correlation with hemoglobin a1c ( hba1c ) ( r = -0.21 , p < 0.05 ; r = -0.28 , p < 0.05 ) , fasting plasma glucose ( r = -0.21 , p < 0.05 ; r = -0.23 , p < 0.05 ) , and postprandial 2-h glucose ( r = -0.30 , p < 0.05 ; r = -0.26 , p < 0.05 , respectively ) .
bt: After adjusting for age, body mass index and energy intake, it was found that dqi - i and hdi had a significant correlation with hemoglobin a1c (hba1c) (r = -0,21 , p < 0,05; r = -0,28 , p < 0,05), fasting plasma glucose (r = -0,21 , p < 0,05; r = -0,23 , p < 0,05), and postprandial glucose 2-h (r = -0)

src: morphometric studies in multicellular organisms are mostly performed manually because of the complexity of multidimensional features and lack of appropriate tools for handling these organisms . here we present an integrated system to autonomously ( i.e. without human supervision ) identify and sort mutants with altered subcellular traits in real - time . we performed self - directed screens of synapse formation 100 faster and found both novel genes and phenotypic classes previously unidentified in extensive manual screens .
bt: Morphometric studies of multicellular organisms are mainly performed manually due to the complexity of multidimensional characteristics and the lack of appropriate tools to manage these organisms.Here we present an integrated system that allows autonomously (i.e. without human supervision) to identify and sort mutants with modified subcellular traits in real time.We have performed self-directed synapse formation screens 100 times faster and have found both new genes and previously unidentified phenotypes classes in extensive manual screens and thus significantly accelerated genetic discovery.

src: objectivean emerging model of metabolic syndrome and type 2 diabetes is of adipose dysfunction with leukocyte recruitment into adipose leading to chronic inflammation and insulin resistance ( ir ) . this study sought to explore potential mechanisms of inflammatory - induced ir in humans with a focus on adipose tissue.research design and methodswe performed a 60-h endotoxemia protocol ( 3 ng / kg intravenous bolus ) in healthy adults ( n = 20 , 50% male , 80% caucasian , aged 27.3 4.8 years ) . before and after endotoxin , whole - blood sampling , subcutaneous adipose biopsies , and frequently sampled intravenous glucose tolerance ( fsigt ) testing were performed .
bt: This objective emerging model of metabolic syndrome and type 2 diabetes is fatty dysfunction with recruitment of leukocytes into the adipose tissue leading to chronic inflammation and insulin resistance (IR).This study sought to explore potential mechanisms of IR-induced inflammation in humans by focusing on adipose tissue.The design of the research and methods were performed on healthy adults (n = 20, 50% male, 80% caucasian, aged 27.3 years and 4.8 years) before and after endotoxin, whole blood sampling, subcutaneous adipose biopsies.

src: methods we reviewed historical records of mortality associated with the 19181920 influenza pandemic in various military and civilian groups on islands . results and conclusions mortality differed more than 50fold during pandemicrelated epidemics on pacific islands [ range : 04% ( hawaii ) to 22% ( samoa ) ] , and on some islands , mortality sharply varied among demographic subgroups of island residents such as saipan : chamorros [ 12% ] and caroline islanders [ 04% ] . among soldiers from island populations who had completed initial military training , influenzarelated mortality rates were generally low , for example , puerto rico ( 07% ) and french polynesia ( 013% ) .
bt: Results and conclusions varied more than 50 times during pandemic outbreaks on the Pacific Islands [ranking: 04% (Hawaii) to 22% (Samoa) ] , and on some islands , mortality varied greatly among the islanders' demographic subgroups such as saipan: chamorros [ 12% ] and the Carolinian islanders [ 04% ] . Among the soldiers of the island populations who had initial military training , influenza-related mortality rates were generally low , for example , in Puerto Rico (07%) and French Polynesia (013%), and this was observed during periods of strong viral circulation.

src: the protein kinase dyrk1a has been suggested to act as one of the intracellular regulators contributing to neurological alterations found in individuals with down syndrome . for an assessment of the role of dyrk1a , selective synthetic inhibitors are valuable pharmacological tools . however , the dyrk1a inhibitors described in the literature so far either are not sufficiently selective or have not been tested against closely related kinases from the dyrk and the clk protein kinase families .
bt: It has been suggested that the protein kinase dyrk1a acts as one of the intracellular regulators contributing to the neurological changes observed in individuals with Down syndrome.To assess the role of dyrk1a, selective synthetic inhibitors are valuable pharmacological tools.However, the dyrk1a inhibitors described in the literature so far are not sufficiently selective or have not been tested against closely related disorders of the protein kinases family of the protein dyrk1a and the protein kinases family of the clk, although some are effective against other types of protein.

src: purposeto evaluate the clinical and radiological results , as well as the survival rate , associated with total hip arthroplasty using a hydroxyapatite ( ha)-coated anatomical femoral stem at a follow - up of 12 years.materials and methodsfrom april 1992 to may 1997 , 86 patients ( 102 hips ) underwent total hip arthroplasty with a ha - coated abg i ( anatomical benoist giraud ; howmedica ) hip prosthesis . the average age at the time of surgery was 53.4 years and the mean duration of follow - up was 17.1 years ( range , 12.1 - 21.0 years ) . the harris hip score ( hhs ) and radiographic assessments of thigh pain were used to evaluate the clinical results .
bt: To assess clinical and radiological outcomes and the survival rate associated with total hip arthroplasty using an anatomical femoral trunk covered with hydroxyapatitis (ha) over a 12-year follow-up period, 86 patients (approximately 102 hips) underwent total hip arthroplasty with a hip prosthesis (approximately one year) covered with an absc (approximately one year) of anatomical blessing; the average age at the time of surgery was 53.4 years and the average duration of follow-up was 17.1 years (variant, 12.1 to 2).

src: right - sided traumatic diaphragmatic rupture in childhood is a very rare injury . diaphragmatic rupture often manifests itself later , after an organ progressively herniates into the pleural cavity . when the patient is tubed , the ventilation pressure does not allow herniation of an organ , which occurs when the patient is ex - tubed .
bt: A traumatic right-sided diaphragmatic rupture in childhood is a very rare injury.The diaphragmatic rupture often manifests itself later, after an organ has progressively herniated into the pleural cavity.When the patient is tubal, the ventilation pressure does not allow the organ to herniate, which occurs when the patient is ex-tubal and receives additional surgical treatment.

src: the current study was a randomized , double - blind , placebo - controlled trial to evaluate the efficacy of a vitamin b complex nutritional supplement ( max stress b ) for improving depressive and anxiety symptoms according to the beck depression and anxiety inventories ( bdi and bai ) in 60 adults diagnosed with major depression or other forms of depressive disorders . secondary outcomes included quality of life according to the sf-36 . participants were assessed at baseline and 30- and 60-day followups .
bt: The current study was a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial to evaluate the effectiveness of a complex vitamin B supplement (max stress b) to improve symptoms of depression and anxiety based on depression and anxiety inventories (bdi and bai) among 60 adults diagnosed with major depression or other forms of depressive disorder.

src: antispasmodic properties of chamomile ease menstrual cramps and lessen the possibility of premature labor . this medicinal herb also stimulates menstruation . in this study , we evaluated the effects of chamomile alcoholic - extract on the biochemical and clinical parameters in a rat model of pcos.materials and methodsestrous cyclicity of 30 virgin adult cycling rats was monitored by vaginal smears obtained between 0800 and 1200 hours .
bt: The anti-spasmodic properties of chamomile relieve menstrual cramps and reduce the possibility of preterm birth.This medicinal herb also stimulates menstruation.In this study, we evaluated the effects of chamomile alcohol extract on biochemical and clinical parameters in a pcos rat model.The results showed a significant improvement in PCOS symptoms in treated rats.Material and method, 30 young unmatched female mice's menstrual cycle were monitored by obtaining vaginal patches between 0800 and 1200 a.m. each morning.

src: we compared the duration of surgery , blood loss , and complications between patients in whom both uterine arteries were ligated at the beginning of total laparoscopic hysterectomy ( tlh ) and patients in whom ligation was done after cornual pedicle . using a prospective study in a gynecologic laparoscopic center , a total of 52 women who underwent tlh from june 2013 to january 2014 were assigned into two groups . in group a , uterine arteries were ligated after the cornual pedicles as done conventionally .
bt: We compared the duration of the surgery, the loss of blood and complications between patients with both uterine arteries linked at the beginning of total laparoscopic hysterectomy (HIST) and patients with ligation after the corneal pedicle. Using a prospective study in a gynecological laparoscopic center, a total of 52 women who underwent ligation from June 2013 to January 2014 were divided into two groups and showed significantly different results.

src: porcine parvovirus ( ppv ) is a widespread infectious virus that causes serious reproductive diseases of swine and death of piglets . the gene coding for the major capsid protein vp2 of ppv was amplified using viral nucleic acid extract from swine serum and inserted into yeast saccharomyces cerevisiae expression plasmid . recombinant ppv vp2 protein was efficiently expressed in yeast and purified using density gradient centrifugation .
bt: The parvovirus porcin (ppv) is a widespread infectious virus that causes serious reproductive diseases in pigs and the death of pigs.The gene encoding the main protein capside vp2 of ppv was amplified using a viral nucleic acid extract from porcine serum and inserted into the plasma of the cervisiae expression in the yeast saccharomyces.The recombinant protein ppv vp2 was effectively expressed in the yeast and purified by centrifugation using the density gradient, which allowed a more precise analysis of the immune properties of this protein.

src: by using rotablation we could abrade the underexpanded stent struts and the calcification with subsequent implantation of a drug - eluting stent . follow - up of 6 months revealed good results without evidence of significant restenosis . our clinical experience and case reports in the literature suggest that this strategy might be an option for underexpanded stents not amenable to conventional techniques .
bt: Using rotablation, we were able to reduce the under-expanded stents and calcification with the subsequent implantation of a drug-eluting stent, and a 6-month follow-up showed good results without evidence of significant restenosis, and our clinical experience and case reports in the literature suggest that this strategy could be an option for under-expanded stents that are not susceptible to conventional techniques.

src: the american society of clinical oncology guidelines recommend sentinel lymph node biopsy ( slnb ) for all patients with melanoma tumors of intermediate thickness ( between 1 and 4 mm ) . in case of patients with thick melanoma tumors ( > 4 mm ) , slnb may be recommended as well , for staging purposes and to facilitate regional disease control . we report a case of an 82-year - old man , undergone excision of a cutaneous melanoma of the right thigh , which shows some limitation of slnb in thick melanoma .
bt: The American Society of Clinical Oncology recommends a biopsy of sentinel lymph nodes (slnb) for all patients with melanoma tumors of medium to thickness (between 1 and 4 mm).In the case of patients with melanoma tumors of thickness ( > 4 mm), the study of melanoma may also be recommended for the purposes of staging and regional control of the disease.We report a case of an 82-year-old man, who underwent an excision of melanoma skin in the right thigh, which shows some limitation of the study of the study of melanoma and requires closer surveillance.

src: purposeto report a case of acute visual loss after endoscopic spinal surgery.methodsa patient was immediately referred to our department after epidural endoscopy with severe bilateral visual impairment and underwent complete ophthalmologic examination.resultsvisual acuity was decreased in both eyes . fundus examination revealed the presence of retinal and vitreous hemorrhages bilaterally . four months later , visual acuity increased and the hemorrhages were remarkably resolved.conclusionthe present case represents an extremely rare incidence of intraocular hemorrhage following epiduroscopy .
bt: Purposeto reports a case of acute vision loss following endoscopic spinal surgery.The patient was immediately referred to our department after an epidural endoscopy with severe bilateral visual impairment and underwent a thorough ophthalmological examination.Ocular pressure was measured and found to be normal.Visual acuity was reduced in both eyes.Fund examination revealed the presence of retinal and vitreous hemorrhage bilaterally.Four months later, visual acuity was present and increased bleeding was resolved remarkably.The case represents a rare extrusion of intraocular hemorrhagic hemorrhagia after an intraocular hemorrhage.

src: single - incision slings were introduced in the surgical treatment of female stress urinary incontinence ( sui ) to lessen the morbidity associated with traditional midurethral slings . however , long - term reports on patient satisfaction are still scarce . this study describes the outcome of women treated with mini - arc at a mean follow - up of 45 months .
bt: Incisive slinges have been introduced in the surgical treatment of female stress urinary incontinence (FUS) to reduce the morbidity associated with traditional midurethral slinges, however, long-term reports of patient satisfaction are still rare, and this study describes the outcome of women treated with a single mini-arc at an average follow-up of 45 months and shows a significant improvement in quality of life.

src: the overall response rate was 28.1% ( n = 123 responses ) , with email response rates being higher than postal mail responses . the most commonly reported barriers to in - person physician visits were parking cost ( 44% ) , time away from work / school ( 34% ) , and cost of gas ( 26% ) . whereas 89% of respondents indicated using telephone and 55% of respondents indicated using email to communicate with providers , none reported experience with video telemedicine .
bt: The overall response rate was 28.1% (n = 123 responses), with email response rates higher than those by post.The most frequently reported obstacles to doctor visits in person were the cost of parking (44%), work/school time (34%) and gas cost (26%).While 89% of respondents reported using the phone and 55% of respondents reported using email to communicate with vendors, none reported having had experience with video-medicine, and this despite its recent rise in popularity.

src: deposits of calcifications in 40 individuals ( 62.5 % ) affected by sialolithiasis were removed endoscopically ; however , in 21 patients , due to the increased circumference of the stone , the intimate association of deposits within the wall of the duct along with its presence inside the deep portions of the gland , double approach ( incision of the floor of the mouth in hilar area and sialendoscopy ) was performed . three individuals had their salivary glands totally removed due to the presence of calcified deposits within the glandular parenchyma . our results allow us to affirm that sialendoscopy is the current treatment of choice for submandibular glands affected by sialoliths .
bt: Calcifications were removed endoscopically in 40 individuals (62.5%), affected by sialolithiasis; however, in 21 patients, due to the increased circumference of the stone, the intimate association of deposits within the wall of the duct and its presence inside the deep parts of the gland, a double approach (incision of the floor of the mouth in the hilar and sialendoscopic region) was performed, significantly improving the therapeutic outcomes.

src: the relative abundance of archaeal and bacterial amoa ( g1 dna ) decreased with increasing ammonium concentrations , and bacterial amoa frequently outnumbered archaeal amoa at the sediment water interface [ 01 cm below seafloor ( cmbsf ) ] . in contrast , aoa were apparently as abundant as aob or dominated in several deeper ( > 10 cmbsf ) , anoxic sediment layers . phylogenetic analyses showed a change within the aoa community along the transect , from two clusters without cultured representatives at the gyre to n itrososphaera and n itrosopumilus clusters in the upwelling region .
bt: The relative abundance of archaeological and bacterial ammonia (g1dna) decreased with increased ammonium concentrations, and bacterial ammonia often outnumbered archaeological ammonia at the water interface of the sediments [01 cm below sea level (cmbsf) ], and was sometimes superior to ammonia in these same sediments. On the other hand, ammonia was apparently as abundant as an aob or dominated in communities of deeper sediments (>10 cmbsf) within the anoxic. Phylogeny analysis showed a change in the transition of the ammonia from two layers of cypress to two layers of native and transverse cultures.

src: knowledge regarding prevalence of hev in general population can be an indicator of the public health and hygiene . therefore , this study was conducted to evaluate the prevalence of hev among adults in south - west of iran . blood samples were taken from 510 participants , 206 ( 40.4% ) males and 304 ( 59.6% ) females from february to july 2014 .
bt: Knowledge of the prevalence of hepatitis in the general population can be an indicator of public health and hygiene, and therefore this study was conducted to assess the prevalence of hepatitis in adults in southwestern Iran.Blood samples were taken from 510 participants, 206 (4.4%) men and 304 (59.6%) women from February to July 2014, and these results showed a significant increase in prevalence compared to previous years.

src: multifocal adenomatous oncocytic hyperplasia ( maoh ) is a non - neoplastic lesion that is classified as oncocytosis . maoh is a rare entity of the parotid gland and accounts for approximately 0.1% of salivary gland lesions . here , we report a case of maoh of the parotid gland .
bt: Multifocal adenofocal oncocytic hyperplasia (maoh) is a non-neoplastic lesion that is classified as oncocytosis. maoh is a rare parotide gland entity and accounts for about 0.1% of salivary gland lesions. however, here we are reporting a case of parotide gland maoh that was misdiagnosed initially.

src: a 52-year - old man visited our emergency center with numbness in his left calf and ankle after falling accident . initial impression by radiologic findings was a spinal subdural hematoma at the l1 level . a follow up image two weeks later , however , did not demonstrate any interval change .
bt: A 52-year-old man visited our emergency center with a numbness in his left panther and ankle after a falling accident.The initial impression of the radiological results was a subdural hematoma of the spine at l1 level.A follow-up image two weeks later, however, shows no change in interval and indicates a possible herniated disc.

src: prebiotics and probiotics are considered natural alternatives to dietary antibiotics in animal production . plant extracts and yeast cell walls are mannose rich products that can be used as substrate for adhesion of gram - negative bacteria . we assessed whether the structure of these saccharides is relevant to develop their role as prebiotics and therefore , their suitability to be used as alternatives to antibiotics to prevent intestinal infections in pigs .
bt: Prebiotics and probiotics are considered natural alternatives to food antibiotics in animal production.Property extracts and yeast cell walls are high in mannose products that can be used as a substrate for the adhesion of gram-negative bacteria.We have evaluated whether the structure of these sucrides is relevant to develop their role as prebiotics and therefore their appropriateness to be used as alternatives to antibiotics to prevent intestinal infections in pigs and thus improve the overall health of pigs.

src: automatic electrocardiogram ( ecg ) signal enhancement has become a crucial pre - processing step in most ecg signal analysis applications . in this letter , the authors propose an automated noise - aware dictionary learning - based generalised ecg signal enhancement framework which can automatically learn the dictionaries based on the ecg noise type for effective representation of ecg signal and noises , and can reduce the computational load of sparse representation - based ecg enhancement system . the proposed framework consists of noise detection and identification , noise - aware dictionary learning , sparse signal decomposition and reconstruction .
bt: Improvement of the electrocardiogram signal (ecg) has become a crucial pre-processing step in most ecg signal analysis applications.In this letter, the authors propose an automated framework for improving the generalised ecg signal based on learning the noise conscious dictionary which can automatically learn the dictionaries based on the type of ecg noise for an efficient representation of the signal and ecg noise, and can reduce the computation of the ecg signal improvement system based on a representation.The proposed framework consists of rare detection and identification of noise, learning the noise conscious dictionary, offering a better diagnosis and reconstruction of rare signal compositions, and better signal accuracy.

src: we performed a prospective study to examine the genetic effect on the response to a calcium ( ca ) channel blocker , azelnidipine and an ace inhibitor , temocapril treatment in patients with hypertension , as a part of the prior clinical trial , the azelnidipine and temocapril in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes study ( attest ) . methods and results . all subjects who gave informed consent for genetic research were divided into two groups : the subjects treated with azelnidipine or temocapril , for 52 weeks .
bt: We conducted a prospective study to examine the genetic effect on the response to a calcium channel blocker (ca), azelindipine and an acid inhibitor, blood glucose and the treatment of testicapil in hypertensive patients, in a previous clinical trial, to azelindipine and testicapil in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes (certified) with methods and results.All subjects who gave informed consent to genetic research were divided into two groups: subjects treated with azelindipine or testicapil, for 52 weeks.

src: purposethe aim of this study was to investigate factors associated with the signal strengths ( ss , image quality scores ) of optic disc and macular images obtained using cirrus spectral domain optical coherence tomography ( oct).methodsninety - two glaucomatous eyes were imaged using the cirrus oct macular and optic disc cube modes after pupil dilation . the influences of patient age , spherical equivalent , cataract presence , and cataract and glaucoma severity ( visual field mean deviation ) , on the ss of images obtained using the two cube modes were compared between patients whose images showed high ss ( ss 7 ) and low ss ( ss < 7).resultsthe signal strength was significantly higher in images obtained using the macular cube compared to the optic disc cube mode ( 7.8 1.3 vs. 6.9 1.1 , respectively ; p = 0.001 ) . age and visual acuity of patients differed significantly between the high- and low - ss groups when data acquired using the optic disc ( p = 0.027 and 0.012 , respectively ) and macular cube modes ( p = 0.046 and 0.014 , respectively ) were analyzed .
bt: The objective of this study was to study the factors associated with the signal forces (SS, image quality scores) of the optical disc and maculaire images obtained using optical coherence tomography (Oct).For the purpose of methods90 - two glaucomatic eyes were imaged using the modes of the maculaire disc and optical eye cube after pupil dilation.The influences of the patient's age, spherical equivalent, the presence of cataracts, the severity of cataracts and glaucoma (average visual deviation), and the pupil dilated on the SS images obtained using the two cube modes were compared between the patients whose fields the images were shown.

src: when tfiiib binding to this trna gene is weakened , an extended sut467atg31 readthrough transcript is produced , resulting in compromised atg31 translation . since the atg31 gene product is required for autophagy , strains expressing the readthrough transcript exhibit defective autophagy induction and reduced fitness under autophagy - inducing nitrogen starvation conditions . given the recent discovery of widespread pervasive transcription in all forms of life , protection of neighboring genes from intergenic transcriptional interference may be a key extratranscriptional function of assembled rna polymerase iii complexes and possibly other dna binding proteins .
bt: Since the product of the atg31 gene is necessary for autophagy, the strains expressing the read transcription have a defective autophagy induction and a reduced fitness condition under autophagy-inducing nitrogen starvation conditions.Given the recent discovery of a pervasive transcription that is widespread in all life forms, protecting neighboring genes from intergenetic interference in transcription can be a key extra-transcriptional function of the complexes rna polymentuerase iii and possibly other proteins.

src: the 2 test revealed genotypic association between rs3918181 and ischemic stroke in males ( 2 = 4.26 , df = 1 , p = 0.039 , or = 1.61 , 95% ci 1.022.53 ) but not in females . the present work suggests that rs3918181 is associated with ischemic stroke in male patients . this finding gives further evidence in support of the enos association with ischemic stroke in the chinese population .
bt: The second test revealed a genotypic association between rs3918181 and an ischemic stroke in men (2 = 4.26 , df = 1 , p = 0.039 , or = 1.61 , 95% ci 1.022.53) but not in women.The present work suggests that rs3918181 is associated with an ischemic stroke in male patients.This discovery provides further evidence to support the association between the enos and an ischemic stroke in the Chinese population.

src: pituitary adenomas ( pas ) are abnormal benign tumors that develop in the pituitary gland . this study aimed to assess the prevalence of different types of pas with an indication for trans - sphenoidal surgery in a well - defined population referred to loghman hakim hospital during 20012013.in this retrospective study , the prevalence rate and symptoms associated with pituitary mass and hormone excess in operated patients were investigated . the diagnosis was verified after retrieval of clinical , hormonal , radiological , and pathological data .
bt: Hypothyroid adenomas (PAS) are abnormal benign tumors that develop in the pituitary gland.This study aimed to assess the prevalence of different types of passes with an indication of trans-sphenoidal surgery in a well-defined population referred to Loghman Hakim Hospital during 2001-2013.In this retrospective study, the prevalence rate and symptoms associated with pituitary mass and excess hormones in the surgical patients were studied.The diagnosis was verified after the recovery of clinical, hormonal, radiological and pathological data, and results showed a significant correlation between prevalence and the prevalence of the disease.

src: subjects were examined at three contrast levels using the oqas . at 100% , 20% , and 9% contrast , simulated mean va was 0.16 0.18 logmar , 0.30 0.18 logmar , and 0.52 0.17 logmar , in normal eyes , and 0.16 0.12 logmar , 0.33 0.20 logmar , and 0.56 0.21 logmar , respectively , in pseudophakic eyes . simulated va decreased significantly when contrast was reduced , regardless of ocular status , age group , and lens type ( p < 0.05 ) .
bt: The subjects were examined at three levels of contrast using the oqas. at 100%, 20%, and 9% contrast, the simulated mean was 0.16 0.18 logmar, 0.30 0.18 logmar, and 0.52 0.17 logmar, in normal eyes, and 0.16 0.12 logmar, 0.33 0.20 logmar, and 0.56 0.21 logmar, respectively, in pseudophagial eyes and the comparison of results shows a significant difference.

src: about one - third of patients presented with disequilibrium . a statistically significant interaction was found between calorics and dizziness in relation to pta thresholds . no relationship was found between calorics and dizziness with vemps responses.conclusionsac and bc vemps can be elicited in ears with otosclerosis .
bt: A statistically significant interaction between calories and vertigo was found with respect to the pta thresholds. no relationship was found between calories and vertigo with vemps responses. gastrointestinal symptoms were also observed in some patients. conclusions ac and bc vemps may be aroused in the ears with osteoarthritis.

src: nucleosomes , a basic structural unit of eukaryotic chromatin , play a significant role in regulating gene expression . we have developed a web tool based on dna sequences known from empirical and theoretical studies to influence dna bending and flexibility , and to exclude nucleosomes . nxsensor ( available at ) finds nucleosome exclusion sequences , evaluates their length and spacing , and computes an accessibility score giving the proportion of base pairs likely to be nucleosome - free .
bt: Nucleosomes, a basic structural unit of eukaryotic chromatin, play an important role in regulating gene expression.We developed a Web tool based on known DNA sequences from empirical and theoretical studies to influence the DNA flex and flexibility, and to exclude nucleosomes.Nensor (available to) find nucleosome exclusion sequences, evaluate their length and spacing, and calculate an access score giving the proportion of base pairs likely to be non-nucleosome.

src: there are different types of polyps , and their different characteristics can indicate different prognosis and treatments .to conduct a comparative study of polypoid lesions ( angiomatous and gelatinous ) in patients undergoing laryngeal microsurgery via an electronic protocol .we prospectively evaluated 93 patients diagnosed with vocal fold polyps ; the polyps were classified as angiomatous or gelatinous .in total , 93 patients undergoing laryngeal microsurgery were diagnosed with vocal fold polyps . of these , 63 ( 64.74% ) had angiomatous and 30 ( 32.26% ) gelatinous polyps . most patients with angiomatous polyps were men ; their polyps were frequently of medium size , positioned in the middle third of the vocal fold , and accompanied by minimal structural alterations ( msa ) .
bt: To conduct a comparative study of polypoid lesions (angiomatous and gelatinous) in patients undergoing electron microsurgence of the larynx, we evaluated in perspective 93 patients diagnosed with vocal folding polyps; the polyps were classified as angio-matuses or gelatinous.

src: link and colleagues present a pilot study investigating platelet function and platelet numbers in patients with cardiogenic shock and acute kidney failure undergoing continuous venovenous haemodialysis . their data indicate a significantly reduced platelet loss with combined therapy of unfractionated heparin plus tirofiban , the glycoprotein iib / iiia antagonist , compared with unfractionated heparin therapy alone . owing to the small sample size , however , the potential impact of additional treatment variables ( antiplatelet agents , intraaortic counterpulsation ) could not be clarified .
bt: The data from these researchers indicate a significantly reduced loss of platelets with combined treatment of unfractionated heparin plus thyrofiban, the antagonist of glycoprotein IIB/IIIA, compared to treatment of unfractionated heparin alone.Due to the small size of the sample, however, the potential impact of additional treatment variables (antiquating agents, intra-thoracic contrapulsation) could not be clarified.

src: service user involvement ( sui ) is a principal and a guideline in social and health care and also in mental health and substance abuse work . in practice , however , there are indicators of sui remaining rhetoric rather than reality . the purpose of this study was to analyse and describe service users ' conceptions of sui in mental health and substance abuse work .
bt: User involvement (sui) is a principle and guideline in social and health care and also in mental health and addiction work. in practice, however, there are indicators of rhetorical rather than real involvement. the purpose of this study was to analyze and describe the conceptions of users of the sui service in mental health and addiction work and to identify the challenges encountered in implementing user involvement.

src: lahedes ( the laglidadg homing endonuclease database and engineering server ) provides both an online archive of lhes with validated dna cleavage specificities and dna - binding interactions , as well as a tool for the identification of dna sequences that might be targeted by various lhes . searches can be performed using four separate scoring algorithms and user - defined choices of lhe scaffolds . the webserver subsequently provides information regarding clusters of amino acids that should be interrogated during engineering and selection experiments .
bt: The laglidadg homing endonuclease database and engineering server provide both an online archive with validated DNA cleavage specifications and DNA binding interactions, as well as a tool to identify the DNA sequences that could be targeted by the different laglidadg.Searches can be performed using four distinct notation algorithms and user-defined choices from scaffolding.The web server then provides information about amino acid clusters that must be interrogated during engineering and selection experiments, and this allows for optimization of the results of experiments.

src: composite layers were applied and shear bond strength was measured . two samples of each group were evaluated by sem . failure mode was determined by streomicroscope.both curing methods and adhesive systems had significant effect on bond strength ( p - value < 0.05 ) .
bt: Two samples from each group were evaluated per sem, an additional failure mode was determined by streomicroscope, and all hardening methods and adhesives systems had a significant effect on bonding force (p - value < 0,05).

src: sepsis is the third largest cause of death in industrialised countries , but treatment remains largely supportive and effective therapeutic interventions are urgently needed . disruption and dysfunction of the microvascular endothelium leading directly or indirectly to multiple organ failure are now recognised to underpin the pathophysiology of sepsis . biomarkers of endothelial activation may therefore assume an important role in guiding future research efforts .
bt: Sepsis is the third leading cause of death in industrialized countries, but treatment remains largely favorable and effective therapeutic interventions are needed.The disturbance and dysfunction of the microvascular endometrium leading directly or indirectly to multiple organ failure are now recognized as the basis of the pathophysiology of sepsis.Endothelial activation biomarkers can therefore play an important role in guiding future research efforts.

src: cubital tunnel syndrome is one of the common upper extremity problem encountered . a mild syndrome can be often treated without surgery , but a failure of conservative treatment with constant symptoms or muscle atrophy and weakness requires surgical intervention . despite the fact that is the second most common nerve entrapment in the upper limb , there is no accepted gold standard in the surgical management .
bt: The syndrome of the cubital tunnel is one of the most common problems encountered in the upper extremity.A mild syndrome can often be treated without surgery, but a failure of conservative treatment with constant symptoms or muscle atrophy and weakness requires surgery.Despite the fact that it is the second most common nerve trap in the upper extremity, there is no accepted gold standard in the surgical management of severe cases.

src: plan to highlight the novelty , scientific merit and clinical impact of the work . try not to overstate the importance of the findings . do not forget to publish the work in a peer reviewed journal .
bt: Plan to highlight the novelty, scientific merit and clinical impact of the work, don't try to overestimate the importance of the results, don't forget to publish the work in a peer-reviewed journal and emphasize the limitations of your study.

src: persistent urogenital sinus ( ugs ) is a developmental anomaly . it represents one of the most complex problems that a pediatric surgeon may deal with . we report the case of a patient with ugs treated at 3 years of age by anterior sagittal transrectal approach and en bloc sinus mobilization .
bt: Persistent urogenital sinus (ugs) is a developmental anomaly, one of the most complex problems a pediatric surgeon can treat, and we are reporting a patient with ugs treated at the age of 3 years with an anterior sagittal transrectal approach and a block mobilization of the sinuses, without postoperative complications.

src: the retrospective data from the patient s index admission from the last six months ( nov 08april 09 ) was analyzed using spss version 16.resulttotal of 517 patients were recruited from october 2008 to march 2009 . majority , 69% were above 70 years old of which 57% female and 76% lives with their children . clinical information demonstrates that 53% had 36 co - morbidities and 58% were taking more than five medications .
bt: Retrospective data from the patient admission index for the past six months (Nov 08 April 09) were analyzed using version 16.resulttttotal of 517 patients were recruited from October 2008 to March 2009.The majority, 69%, were over 70 years old, of whom 57% are women and 76% live with their children.Clinical data shows that 53% had 36 comorbidities and 58% took more than five medications.

src: cell - seeded hydrogels slightly decelerated degeneration.conclusionsnone of the hydrogel configurations was able to regenerate biofunctionality of the intervertebral disc . this might presumably be caused by hydrogel extrusion . great importance should be given to the development of annulus sealants , which effectively exploit the potential of ( cell - seeded ) hydrogels for biological disc regeneration and restoration of intervertebral disc functioning .
bt: The hydrogels have been slightly slowed down in decay.Conclusions: None of the hydrogel configurations has been able to regenerate the biofonction of the intervertebral disc. - This could be due to the extrusion of the hydrogel. - Great importance should be given to the development of cancellation sealants, which effectively exploit the potential of hydrogels (dry cells) for biological regeneration of the disc and restoration of the functioning of the intervertebral disc and to improve the durability of hydrogels over time.

src: abstractover the past 2 decades , therapies based on mesenchymal stem cells ( msc ) have been tested to treat several types of diseases in clinical studies , due to their potential for tissue repair and regeneration . currently , msc - based therapy is considered a biologically safe procedure , with the therapeutic results being very promising . however , the benefits of these therapies are not stable in the long term , and the final outcomes manifest with high inter - patient variability .
bt: Over the past two decades, therapies based on mesenchymal stem cells (MSCs) have been tested to treat several types of diseases in clinical trials, due to their potential for tissue repair and regeneration .Currently, MSC-based therapy is considered a biologically safe procedure, with therapeutic results being very promising . , the benefits of these therapies are not stable in the long term , and the end results manifest with a high variability among patients .

src: the assays were 1 ) competitive binding with the mouse uterine estrogen receptor , 2 ) transcriptional activation in hela cells transfected with plasmids containing an estrogen receptor and a response element , and 3 ) the uterotropic assay in mice . the chemicals studied were 17 beta - estradiol , diethylstilbestrol , tamoxifen , 4-hydroxytamoxifen , methoxychlor , the methoxychlor metabolite 2,2-bis(p - hydroxyphenyl)-1,1,1-trichloroethane ( hpte ) , endosulfan , nonylphenol , o , p'-ddt , and kepone . these studies were conducted to assess the utility of this three - assay combination in the routine screening of chemicals , or combinations of chemicals , for estrogenic activity .
bt: The trials were 1) competitive with the estrogen receptor in the uterus of mice , 2) transcriptional activation in all cells transfected with plasmids containing an estrogen receptor and a response element , and 3) the uterotropic test in mice .The chemicals studied were 17 beta-estradiol , diethylstilbestrol , tamoxifen , 4-hydroxytamoxifen , methoxychlor , the metabolite of methoxychloride 2,2-bis -p - hydroxyphl)-1,1,1-chloro-ethane (fantripte , hul , nonylphenol , o, pddt , and ketone).

src: first , computed tomography ( ct ) demonstrated a bulky mass in the pulmonary sequestration . the size of lesion and histopathology made it an unusual presentation . final histology study demonstrated pulmonary hamartoma with predominantly adipose and cartilage differentiation , which is an unusual complication originated from ilps .
bt: First, computed tomography (CT) has demonstrated a large mass in pulmonary sequestration, the size of the lesion and histopathology have made it an unusual presentation, and a final history study has shown a pulmonary hamartoma with a differentiation mainly of fat and cartilage, an unusual complication of the ilps and rarely observed in this context.

src: it was observed on diffusion - weighted images that with time , these high signal intensity lesions migrated from the putamen to the caudate nuclei , which closely correlated with disease progression . because his symptoms and abnormal magnetic resonance imaging findings progressed despite treatment with coenzyme q10 and l - carnitine , at 7 years of age he was then started on sodium succinate , hoping to improve his complex i deficiency . after treatment , progression of mri abnormalities appeared to have been suppressed for 4 years , although no improvement was observed in dystonia .
bt: It was observed on the weighted diffusion images that, over time, these high-intensity signal lesions migrated from the putamen to the caudative nuclei, which was closely related to the progression of the disease.Because its symptoms and abnormal results of magnetic resonance imaging progressed despite treatment with coenzyme q10 and l-carnitine, at age 7, it then began taking sodium succinate, in the hope of improving its lack of complexes i. After treatment, the progression of abnormalities appears to have been suppressed 4 years ago, although no improvement was observed in the dystonia, and this has a significant impact on the quality of life.

src: mitochondria are of central importance for energy generation in skeletal muscles . expression changes or functional alterations in mitochondrial enzymes play a key role during myogenesis , fibre maturation , and various neuromuscular pathologies , as well as natural fibre aging . mass spectrometry - based proteomics suggests itself as a convenient large - scale and high - throughput approach to catalogue the mitochondrial protein complement and determine global changes during health and disease .
bt: Mitochondria are of central importance for the production of energy in skeletal muscles.Alterations in expression or functional alterations of mitochondrial enzymes play a key role in myogenesis, fiber maturation and various neuromuscular pathologies, as well as the aging of natural fibers.Proteomy based on mass spectrometry presents itself as a practical, large-scale and broad-spectrum approach to cataloging mitochondrial protein complementation and determining global changes during health and disease.Moreover, these alterations can directly affect muscle performance and endurance.

src: this study aimed to consider the significance of breast milk in preventing oxidative stress by comparing total antioxidant capacity ( tac ) in breast milk and formula milk for premature infants , demonstrating the relationship between tac in breast milk and postnatal age in days . we used the biological anti - oxidant potential test , a new method to measure tac in breast milk . breast milk for premature infants were stored at 20c and thawed within 48 h of collection .
bt: This study aimed to examine the importance of breast milk in preventing oxidative stress by comparing the total antioxidant capacity (tac) of breast milk and formula milk for premature infants, demonstrating the relationship between tac in breast milk and postnatal age within a few days.We also used the potential biological antioxidant test, a new method of measuring tac in breast milk.

src: the management of traumatic peripheral nerve injury remains a considerable concern for clinicians . with minimal innovations in surgical technique and a limited number of specialists trained to treat peripheral nerve injury , outcomes of surgical intervention have been unpredictable . the inability to manipulate the pathophysiology of nerve injury ( i.e. , wallerian degeneration ) has left scientists and clinicians depending on the slow and lengthy process of axonal regeneration ( ~1 mm / day ) .
bt: With minimal innovations in surgical technique and a limited number of specialists trained to treat peripheral nerve lesions, the results of surgery were unpredictable, and the inability to manipulate the pathophysiology of nerve lesions (i.e. valereal degeneration) has left scientists and clinicians dependent on the slow and long process of axonal regeneration (~1 mm/day), despite recent advances in gene therapy.

src: bacterial parapneumonic pleural effusions ( ppes ) have high morbidity . the accurate identification of pathogens is vital for initiating the appropriate treatment . a previous study suggested that the use of blood culture bottles might improve the bacterial yield in ppes.the aim of this study was to compare the culture positivity rate by the blood culture bottles and the standard culture bottles in bacterial ppes.patients diagnosed with ppes at the khon kaen hospital , khon kaen , thailand , which is an endemic area of melioidosis , were enrolled consecutively and prospectively .
bt: Bacterial parapneumonic pleural effusions (PPEs) have a high morbidity.The precise identification of pathogens is essential to initiate appropriate treatment.An earlier study suggested that the use of blood culture bottles could improve bacterial yield in PPEs.The aim of this study was to compare the rate of culture positivity by blood culture bottles and standard culture bottles in PPEs.Patients diagnosed with pepper at Khon Kaen Hospital, Khon Kaen, Thailand, which is an endemic zone of meidosis, were enrolled in a sequential and prospective manner.

src: first - generation drug - eluting stents have raised concerns regarding the risk of late and very late stent thrombosis compared with bare metal stents and require prolonged dual antiplatelet therapy . despite extensive investigations , the physiopathology of these late events remains incompletely understood . aside from patient- and lesion - related risk factors , stent polymer has been cited as one of the potential causes .
bt: First-generation hallucinogenic stents have raised concerns about the risk of late and very late thrombosis of the stent compared to bare metal stents and require prolonged double antiplatelet therapy.Despite extensive research, the physiopathology of these late events remains incomplete.Other than the risk factors associated with patient and injury, the stent polymer has been cited as one of the potential causes, despite recent advances in biocompatible materials.

src: the new medicare prospective payment system has been challenged with regard to its fairness in reimbursing hospitals adequately , given the true resource needs in caring for patients . most of these criticisms are now labelled as issues about adjustments for severity of illness . critics point to the large amount of unexplained variation in charges and length of stay within the existing drg 's as indirect support for their contentions about inadequate adjustments.a paradigm is presented which argues that the key questions on the types of severity of illness measures to be utilized in future refinements of drg 's revolve around the extent and type of data which can feasibly be included in any workable reimbursement approach .
bt: Most of these criticisms are now classified as questions of adjustment of the severity of the disease.The criticisms point to the large unexplained variation in the cost and duration of stay in existing diets as indirect support for their arguments about inadequate adjustments.A paradigm is presented that the key questions about the types of severity of disease measures to be used in future improvements of diets revolve around nature and the type of data that can be included in any reimbursable approach.Moreover, these inadequate adjustments can have significant implications for the health system's equity.

src: in neural stem / progenitor cells , expression of the notch effector hes1 , a transcriptional repressor , oscillates with a period of 23 h by negative feedback , and hes1 oscillations induce the oscillatory expression of the proneural gene neurogenin2 ( ngn2 ) and the notch ligand gene delta - like1 ( dll1 ) . dll1 oscillation leads to the mutual activation of notch signaling between neighboring cells , thereby maintaining a group of cells in the undifferentiated state . not all cells express hes1 in an oscillatory manner : cells in boundary regions such as the isthmus express hes1 in a sustained manner , and these cells are rather dormant with regard to proliferation and differentiation .
bt: Neural stem cells / progenitor cells , the expression of notch hes1 effect , a transcription suppressor , oscillate for a period of 23 hours per negative feedback , and hes1 oscillations induce oscillatory expression of the proneural neurogenin2 gene ( ngn2) and the notch-like1 delta ligand gene ( dll1).

src: case summarythis case describes a young non - pregnant cat that presented with uterine prolapse in association with an unusual diffuse , polypoid , fibrosing perimetritis and parametritis . following ovariohysterectomy the cat recovered fully . no intra - abdominal complications were seen on ultrasound examination 3 months postsurgery .
bt: This case describes a young non-pregnant cat who had a prolapsed uterine uterus associated with diffuse fibrosant perimeteritis, polypoid and unusual parametrity.After ovariohysterectomy, the cat fully recovered.No intra-abdominal complications were observed during ultrasound examination 3 months after surgery.However, the cat also showed signs of dehydration.

src: to measure the incidence of ampicillin - resistant uropathogens in acute antepartum pyelonephritis and to determine if patients with resistant organisms had different clinical outcomes . study design . this was a secondary analysis of a prospective cohort study of pregnant women admitted with pyelonephritis , diagnosed by standard clinical and laboratory criteria .
bt: To measure the incidence of ampicillin-resistant uropathogens in antiseptic acute pyelonephritis and to determine whether patients with resistant organisms had different clinical outcomes, improving quality of life was a secondary objective.

src: ergonomics is becoming a subject of applying fundamentals on anthropocentric dimensions for holistic welfare . the so - called conflict between basic science and applied research finds one of its edges in ergonomics . be it cutting - edge technology or frontiers of scientific innovation all start from understanding basic scientific aptitude and skill , and the best way to get familiar with the situation is practicing basic science again and again at a regular basis .
bt: Ergonomics is becoming a subject of application of the fundamentals of the anthropocentric dimensions for holistic well-being.The so-called conflict between basic science and applied research finds one of its advantages in ergonomics.Whether it is cutting-edge technology or the frontiers of scientific innovation, it all starts with understanding basic scientific competence and skill, and the best way to familiarize yourself with the situation is to regularly practice basic sciences and ergonomic studies.

src: when using the mass balance equation to model indoor air quality , the primary assumption is that of uniform mixing . different points in a single compartment are assumed to have the same instantaneous pollutant concentrations as all other points . although such an assumption may be unrealistic , under certain conditions predictions ( or measurements ) of exposures at single points in a room are still within acceptable limits of error ( e.g. , 10% ) .
bt: When using the mass equilibrium equation to model indoor air quality, the main hypothesis is that of a uniform mixture.The different points in the same compartment are assumed to have the same instantaneous concentrations of pollutants as all other points.While this hypothesis may be unrealistic, under certain conditions, predictions (or measurements) of exposures to individual points in a room are always within acceptable error limits (e.g., 10%).However, this approach can underestimate local variations in pollutant concentrations.

src: background & aimsintestinal adaptation is a compensatory response to the massive loss of small intestine after surgical resection . we investigated the role of intestinal epithelial cell specific mammalian target of rapamycin complex 1 ( i - mtorc1 ) in intestinal adaptation after massive small bowel resection ( sbr).methodswe performed 50% proximal sbr on mice to study adaptation . to manipulate i - mtorc1 activity , villin - creer transgenic mice were crossed with tuberous sclerosis complex ( tsc)1flox / flox or raptorflox / flox mice to inducibly activate or inactivate i - mtorc1 activity with tamoxifen .
bt: Intestinal adaptation is a compensatory response to the massive loss of small intestine after surgical resection.We studied the role of the specific epithelial intestine of the target mammal of the rapamycin 1 (i-mtorc1) complex in intestinal adaptation after large intestine resection (sbr).The method was performed on mice to study adaptation.To manipulate the i-mtorc1 activity, transgenic mice were combined with mice with tuberculosis complex mice (TSC) 1flox/flox or raptorf/flox to activate or inactivate tamoxifenc1 activity with lexifenclox.

src: backgroundwilms tumor ( wt ) is the most common malignant renal tumor in children . previous studies suggested the reversion - inducing , cysteine - rich protein with kazal motifs ( reck ) down - regulation might have a role in numerous human cancers . the current study was done to investigate the associations of reck single - nucleotide polymorphisms ( snps ) with the wt susceptibility in chinese children.material/methodswe analyzed 2 snps ( rs10972727and rs11788747 ) in a total of 97 wt children and 194 healthy matched controls ( 1:2 ratio ) by real - time pcr and pcr - rflp genotyping analysis.resultswe found that the g allele of rs11788747 in the reck gene was significantly associated with wt in chinese children ( or=0.7 , 95% ci : 0.450.99 ; p=0.042 ) ; as with another snp rs10972727 , however , no statistically significant difference was detected .
bt: Wound tumor (Wt) is the most common malignant kidney tumor in children.Previous studies have suggested that the reversal - inducing, cysteine - a protein rich in kazal (reck) downward regulation - may play a role in many human cancers.The current study was conducted to study the associations of mono-nucleotide wound polymorphisms (MNP) with Wt sensitivity in Chinese children.Materials/methods: We analyzed 2 SNPs (rs10972727 and rs11788747) in a total of 97 Wt children and healthy controls (ratio 1:2) by analysing

src: in - depth , reproducible coverage of complex proteomes is challenging because the complexity of tryptic digests subjected to lc - ms / ms analysis frequently exceeds mass spectrometer analytical capacity , which results in undersampling of data . in this study , we used cancer cell lysates to systematically compare the commonly used gelc - ms / ms ( 1-d protein + 1-d peptide separation ) method using four repetitive injections ( 2-d / repetitive ) with a 3-d method that included solution isoelectric focusing and involved an equal number of lc - ms / ms runs . the 3-d method detected substantially more unique peptides and proteins , including higher numbers of unique peptides from low - abundance proteins , demonstrating that additional fractionation at the protein level is more effective than repetitive analyses at overcoming lc - ms / ms undersampling .
bt: In this study, we used cancer cell lysates to systematically compare the gelc - ms / ms (protein separation method 1-d + 1-d peptide 1-d) commonly used with four repeat injections (protein separation method 2-d / 1-d) with a 3-d method that included an isoelectric concentration of solution and involved an equal number of lc - ms / ms strokes.

src: abstractbackground and objectivesnepal has made progress with the control of hiv infection in recent years . there have been changes in epidemiology , programme interventions in different population groups , and changes in policies over the last 10 years , particularly in diagnosis and treatment . therefore , this review was conducted to identify the effectiveness of different interventions / policies in different sub - populations at risk , targeted towards epidemiology and treatment outcomes for those with hiv infection in nepal.methodsthis review was prepared based on a review of published and unpublished documents from the nepalese hiv infection control programme , published articles in different journals , different survey reports including integrated bio - behavioural surveillance ( ibbs ) survey reports.resultsthe prevalence of hiv infection among adults in 2014 was 0.20% with a progressive decreasing trend from 2005 .
bt: There have been changes in epidemiology, program interventions in different population groups, and policy changes over the past 10 years, particularly in diagnosis and treatment, and therefore this review was conducted to identify the effectiveness of different interventions/policy in different risk subpopulations, targeting epidemiology and treatment outcomes for people infected with HIV in Nepal.The methodology for this examination was prepared on the basis of an examination of published and unpublished documents from the Nepalese HIV control program, articles published in different journals, different investigative reports, including reports on biological surveillance (IBBS).

src: however , other genes such as cyp1a2 and cyp2b11 control the protein syntheses involved in the metabolism of many drugs . in the present study , the mdr-1 , cyp1a2 and cyp2b11 genes were examined to identify snp polymorphisms associated with these genes in the following four canine breeds : uruguayan cimarron , border collie , labrador retriever and german shepherd . the results revealed that several snps of the cyp1a2 and cyp2b11 genes are potential targets for drug sensitivity investigations .
bt: However, other genes such as cyp1a2 and cyp2b11 control protein synthesis involved in the metabolism of many drugs.In this study, the genes mdr-1, cyp1a2 and cyp2b11 were examined to identify snp polymorphisms associated with these genes in the following four canine breeds: Uruguayan cimarron, border collie, labretriever and German shepherd.The results revealed that several snps of the cyp1a2 and cyp2b11 genes are potential targets for investigations into drug sensitivity and drug toxicity.

src: metastatic dtc can often be treated in a targeted manner with radioactive iodine , but the ability to accumulate iodine is lost with decreasing differentiation . until recently , chemotherapy was the only treatment in patients with advanced thyroid cancer , which is no longer amenable to therapy with radioactive iodine . the modest efficacy and significant toxicity of chemotherapy necessitated the need for urgent advances in the medical field .
bt: Metastatic dtc can often be treated with radioactive iodine in a targeted manner, but the ability to accumulate iodine is lost with diminishing differentiation.Until recently, chemotherapy was the only treatment for patients with advanced thyroid cancer, who are no longer susceptible to receiving treatment with radioactive iodine.The modest efficacy and significant toxicity of chemotherapy have required urgent advances in the medical field, despite advances in immunotherapy.

src: psoriasis usually precedes psoriatic arthritis , so dermatologists are in a critical position for screening patients of psoriatic arthritis early in the disease course . psoriatic arthritis may be challenging to diagnose , especially for dermatologists , because it has an insidious disease course , non - specific symptoms , and no specific biomarkers . psoriatic arthritis is a polygenic autoimmune disorder of unknown etiology , but immunologic roles have recently been validated .
bt: Psoriasis usually precedes psoriatic arthritis, so dermatologists are in a critical position to screen patients with psoriatic arthritis early in the course of the disease.Psoriatic arthritis can be difficult to diagnose, especially for dermatologists, as it has an insidious course of the disease, nonspecific symptoms and no specific biomarker disorder.Psoriatic arthritis is an autoimmune polygene of unknown etiology, but immunological roles have recently been validated and this complicates the initial diagnosis even more.

src: mothers were trained to identify signs of on and attend a follow - up visit . forty - two newborns had ocular pathology , and 11 ( 4.4% ) had clinical signs of on at the time of delivery . maternal pcr was positive for mg ( n = 19 ) , ct ( n = 8) , and ng ( n = 2 ) .
bt: Mothers were trained to identify signs of survival and to attend a follow-up visit, forty-two newborns had eye disease and 11 (4.4%) had clinical signs of survival at birth, and maternal survival was positive for mg (n = 19), ct (n = 8) and ng (n = 2), but some newborns also had hearing problems.

src: the index case is a 28 years old nigerian female who was referred to our special treatment clinic on account of an abnormal pap smear cytology which was in keeping with herpes cervicitis . there was no history of genital ulcer in this patient ; however elisa for hsv 2 igm was positive in her . we therefore describe a case of herpes cervicitis in an asymptomatic woman on intrauterine contraceptive device .
bt: The indicated case is a 28-year-old Nigerian woman who was sent back to our special treatment clinic due to an abnormal pap smear cytology that was consistent with cervical herpes.There was no history of genital ulcer in this patient; however, the ELISA for HSV 2 IgM was positive in her.We are therefore describing a case of cervical herpes in an asymptomatic woman on an intrauterine contraceptive device.

src: after diagnosing the symptoms of ii / iii stage hypothermia according to the swiss staging system , the mountain rescue service notified the coordinator from the severe accidental hypothermia center ( clhg ) coordinator in krakow and then kept in constant touch with him . in accordance with the protocol for managing such situations , the coordinator started the procedure for patients in severe hypothermia with the option of extracorporeal warming and secured access to a device for continuous mechanical chest compression . after reaching the hospital , extracorporeal warming with ecmo support in the arteriovenuous configuration was started .
bt: Diagnosing the symptoms of stage ii / iii hypothermia according to the Swiss staging system , the mountain rescue service notified the coordinator of the centre for accidental severe hypothermia (clhg) in Krakow and then kept in constant contact with him. in accordance with the protocol for managing such situations , the coordinator started the procedure for patients with severe hypothermia with the ability to warm themselves outside the body and have access to a continuous mechanical chest compression device.

src: we present an extremely rare case of noninfiltrating angiolipoma ( al ) of the buccal mucosa in a 90-year - old patient reaching a size of 14 cm 10 cm . al is rare in the soft tissues of oral cavity , and till date , only 22 cases have been reported , including our case . if size be taken into consideration , our case can be considered to be the first in literature to reach this massive size .
bt: We present an extremely rare case of a non-infiltrating angiolipoma (al) of the oral mucosa in a 90-year-old patient reaching a size of 14 cm 10 cm. Unfortunately, this angiolipoma has also caused heart problems, as is rare in the soft tissues of the oral cavity, and to date, only 22 cases have been reported, including our case.

src: restrictive cardiomyopathy ( rcm ) is a relatively rare form of cardiomyopathy with high mortality which is characterized by impaired filling of the ventricles in the presence of normal wall thickness and systolic function . rcm is generally seen in association with infiltrative , storage , or systemic diseases . we present a rare case of familial rcm with pregnancy which was successfully managed .
bt: Restrictive cardiomyopathy (rcm) is a relatively rare form of high-mortality cardiomyopathy characterized by poor ventricular filling in the presence of normal wall thickness and systolic function. rcm is generally seen in association with infiltrative, stored or systemic diseases. we present a rare case of familial rcm with pregnancy that has been successfully managed.

src: the expression profile of dppiv was obtained for seven cancer cell lines using dna microarray data from the dtp database , and was validated by rt - pcr . a prodrug was then synthesized by linking the cytotoxic drug melphalan to a proline - glycine dipeptide moiety , followed by hydrolysis studies in the seven cell lines with a standard substrate , as well as the glycyl - prolyl - melphalan ( gp - mel ) . lastly , cell proliferation studies were carried out to demonstrate enzyme - dependent activation of the candidate prodrug .
bt: The dppiv expression profile was obtained for seven lines of cancer cells using DNA microarray data from the DTP database, and was validated by RT-PCR. A prodrug was then synthesized by binding the cytotoxic drug melphalan to a molecule of the proline-glycine dipeptide, followed by hydrolysis studies in the seven cell lines with a standard substrate, as well as glycyl-prolyl-melphalan (GP-mel).

src: hence , reported solutions can be analyzed for the management of diabetes . notably , there are many herbs mentioned in itm that remain to be studied . therefore , further studies are required to substantiate their effects scientifically in order to develop new effective drugs .
bt: Therefore, the reported solutions can be analyzed for the management of diabetes, in particular, there are many herbs mentioned in the article that remain to be studied, and therefore further studies are needed to support their effects scientifically in order to develop new effective drugs and thus improve the quality of life of patients.

src: the length of the procedure and any intraoperative complications were evaluated.resultsoperative time ( meanstandard deviation ) was shorter in the group using the magnetic anchoring device ( m - less - n ) than in the group with conventional less nephrectomy ( c - less - n ) ( 6320.8 minutes vs. 8240.7 minutes , respectively ) . although all nephrectomies were completed uneventfully in the m - less - n group , renal vein injury occurred during dissection of the renal hilum in two cases of c - less - n and was resolved by simultaneous transection of the renal artery and vein with an endo - gia stapler.conclusionsless-n using mags is a feasible technique for surgeons with no less surgery experience . taking into account the 2 cases of renal vein injury in the c - less - n group , the application of mags may be beneficial for overcoming the learning curve of less surgery .
bt: The duration of the procedure and intraoperative complications were evaluated.resultsOperative time (average standard deviation) was shorter in the group using the magnetic anchorage (m - minus - n) than in the group with the less conventional nephrectomy (c - minus - n) (6320.8 minutes vs. 8240.7 minutes, respectively).Although all nephrectomies were performed without incident in the group m - minus - n, renal artery lesion occurred during dissection of the renal hilleur in two cases of c - minus - n and was resolved by simultaneous transcription of the kidney and vein with a - stapler.

src: cellular dynamics are controlled by key signaling molecules such as camp - dependent protein kinase ( pka ) and protein kinase c ( pkc ) . akap12/ssecks / gravin ( akap12 ) is a scaffold protein for pka and pkc which controls actin - cytoskeleton reorganization in a spatiotemporal manner . akap12 also acts as a tumor suppressor which regulates cell - cycle progression and inhibits src - mediated oncogenic signaling and cytoskeletal pathways .
bt: Cell dynamics are controlled by key signaling molecules such as camp-dependent protein kinase (pka) and protein kinase c (pkc).Akap12/ssecks/gravin (akap12) is a floor protein for pka and pkc that controls the reorganization of the actin-cytoskeleton in a spatiotemporal manner.Akap12 also acts as a tumor suppressor that regulates the progression of the cell cycle and inhibits oncogene signaling mediated by src and the cytoskeletal pathways and excessive cell growth.

bt: The access needle was by surface technique 65.8% , the rope scale 28.2% and the red button 6% .The most common direction of perforation was the antegrade with the tip upwards (43.1%).A Cox regression model was applied, adjusted for effects in the country, and defining as events the need to create a new vascular access, which significantly improves clinical outcomes.

src: the pathological diagnosis was focal sos , which showed sinusoidal dilation and congestion by hepatocyte trabeculae in the liver parenchyma.conclusionsatypical irregular tumors should be considered as sos when the patient has received oxaliplatin - based chemotherapy . a qualitative imaging modality diagnosis , such as with diffusion - weighted mri , is superior to a morphological diagnosis in focal sos . this imaging modality can prevent unnecessary operations .
bt: The pathological diagnosis was that of the focal plant, which showed sinus dilation and congestion by hepatocyte trabeculars in the parenchyma liver. conclusionsatypes Irregular tumors should be considered tumors if the patient received oxaliplatin chemotherapy. a diagnosis of the qualitative imaging modality, as with the weighted diffusion-mri plant, is superior to a morphological diagnosis in the focal plant. this imaging modality can prevent unnecessary operations and thus reduce the patient's morbidity.

src: restoring posterior teeth with resin - based composite materials continues to gain popularity among clinicians , and the demand for such aesthetic restorations is increasing . indeed , the most common aesthetic alternative to dental amalgam is resin composite . moderate to large posterior composite restorations , however , have higher failure rates , more recurrent caries , and increased frequency of replacement .
bt: Restoration of the posterior teeth with composite materials based on resin continues to gain popularity among clinicians, and the demand for such aesthetic restorations is increasing. Indeed, the most common aesthetic alternative to dental amalgamation is composite resin, but patients often prefer dentures.

src: radiographs revealed a laterally displaced and vertically rotated patella along its long axis with the medial patellar edge locked and dipping into the lateral gutter . open reduction was performed along with lateral patellar retinacular release with medial patellar retinaculum plication , to achieve satisfactory patellar stability and patellofemoral tracking.we would recommend that in the settings of patella being vertically dislocated and locked , open reduction would be the management of choice , as these types of dislocations are difficult to relocate by closed reduction . repeated attempts of closed reduction may cause osteochondral damage .
bt: Analyses revealed a patella that moved laterally and rotated vertically along its long axis with the medial patellaire edge locked and plunging into the lateral gout. Significant pain in the femoral-tibial joint was also observed. An open reduction was performed with the radical release of the lateral patellaire retinacular with the pllication of the medial patellaire retinaculum, to obtain satisfactory patellaire stability and patellofÃ©moral monitoring.

src: patients with psoriasis might be at a higher risk of developing parkinson 's disease ( pd ) as a result of the detrimental effect of chronic inflammation on the neuronal tissue . this meta - analysis aimed to investigate this risk by comprehensively reviewing all available data.we conducted a systematic review and meta - analysis of cohort and case control studies that reported relative risk , hazard ratio , odds ratio , or standardized incidence ratio comparing the risk of pd in patients with psoriasis versus subjects without psoriasis . pooled risk ratio and 95% confidence interval ( ci ) were calculated using random - effect , generic inverse variance methods of dersimonian and laird.three retrospective studies and one case control study met our eligibility criteria and were included in this meta - analysis .
bt: This meta-analysis aimed to study this risk by thoroughly examining all available data.We conducted a systematic review and meta-analysis of cohort and case control studies that reported relative risk, a risk ratio, a probability ratio or a standardized incidence ratio comparing the risk of psoriasis in patients with psoriasis to subjects without psoriasis.The combined risk ratio and 95% confidence rate (CI) were calculated using a random variable, generic inverse variance methods from our studies, the Cochrane methods and the Laird methods.Three case-control studies and a retrospective study that met the criteria for the test were calculated using the same random variable.

bt: On the same day, two people were randomly selected as a control group among the pilgrims who had not been touched so far.During the pilgrimage, 32 pilgrims (9.5%) were affected by respiratory infections other than common colds.In the invariable logistical regression analysis, the gargling of salt water (or = 2.4, p = 0.08), the presence of another patient in the room (or = 2.14, p = 0.19), the age of over 60 (or = 1.84, p = 0.15), education above or equal to 3 years (or = 1.93, p = 0.16).
